dialogue.text: Are we all good to go?
Yep! Internet’s stable, our mics are all hooked up, and the camera’s all ready.
Then let’s make this a great first stream!
H-hello, everyone! Oh, wow... There are a lot more people tuning in than I expected-
See? You were totally right when you said people would tune in for this. Look at that chat already going crazy!
Take a quick breather, Sunny. I know you got this.
Thank you for tuning in! I know this format is a lot different from my blog, but I’ve been meaning to try something a bit more personal lately, so here we are!
Welcome to SynSun! Our new website and live show for all things going on in the music industry.
Consider this place a one stop shop for everything you need to get up to date and in the groove!
On the left here, we set up some links that’ll take you to key resources.
All the while, we’ll be hosting our live show over here on the right! Come swing by and ask us questions about your favorite musicians and songs!
Check back with us often! New things are happening all the time, and we'll be the first to discuss it all!
(Was that good for a first intro? Did I do ok, Syn?)
(You hit it out of the park, Sunny.)
